jobDescription: Radar Data Analyst ****************************************************** This position requires the ability to obtain a Security Clearance  In order to apply for a Security Clearance you need to be a U.S. Citizen ****************************************************** Position Scope/Job Functions  The Advanced Sensors and Techniques group requires engineering support to integrate, evaluate, and test optical and radar image processing algorithms. The candidate should have experience with algorithm development, unit level testing, and integrated system testing. Knowledge of MATLAB is required and experience implementing and validating MATLAB algorithms in C/C++ is desired.  Skills: Required  PhD in Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or related discipline, or MS plus 5 years minimum experience.  Working knowledge of MATLAB, system integration and test required. C/C++ desired.  Skills: Preferred  Must be a quick-study, able to work with a team and independently.  Must be able to document, track, and present work.  PhD in Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or related discipline, or MS plus 5 years minimum experience.  We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
